column1: Local Foods////Local's one of those places you try every few months if you don't want to drop $12 on lunch. Overall
column2: a pretty solid offering and a great place to get lunch with friends. Service is good
column3: the venue is pretty (the outside patio is great in good weather)
column4: and it's just down the street from Rice Village but with its OWN parking lot. What more do you need?
